summary: Overview of building complex task agents using the deepagents library, including planning, subagents, and file system capabilities.

structure.title: Deep Agents overview
structure.summary: Overview of building complex task agents with planning, subagents, and file system capabilities using the deepagents library.

nodes.path: overview > Deep Agents overview > When to use deep agents
nodes.title: When to use deep agents
nodes.summary: Describes scenarios where deep agents are suitable, such as handling complex tasks, managing large context, delegating work, and persisting memory.

nodes.path: overview > Deep Agents overview > Core capabilities
nodes.title: Core capabilities
nodes.summary: Deep agents feature planning, context management, subagent spawning, and long-term memory capabilities to handle complex tasks efficiently.

nodes.path: overview > Deep Agents overview > Relationship to the LangChain ecosystem
nodes.title: Relationship to the LangChain ecosystem
nodes.summary: Deep agents leverage LangGraph for graph execution, LangChain for tool integrations, and LangSmith for deployment and monitoring.

nodes.path: overview > Deep Agents overview > Get started
nodes.title: Get started
nodes.summary: Introduces quickstart, customization, middleware understanding, and API reference for deep agents.
